php.LBL_REGISTRATION_OFFLINE_DESC: In order to register a system that does not have access to the Internet, please send an email to %s together with the entity's data.
php.LBL_REGISTRATION_OFFLINE_EXAMPLE:
Subject: YetiForce offline registration

Message:
CRM registration:
Company name or first and last name: %s
Country: %s
City: %s
The number of employees of the company: %s
Your company's website: %s
Product key: %s 
APP ID: %s
Version: %s
php.LBL_REGISTRATION_COMPANY_DETAILS_VARY: Les détails de l'entreprise varient, une réinscription est requise.
php.LBL_NO_INTERNET_CONNECTION: Il n'y a pas de connexion Internet
php.LBL_EMAIL_INFO: Nous enverrons vos données d'accès à cette adresse e-mail
php.LBL_SUCCESSFUL_TRANSACTION: Merci d'avoir effectué le paiement. La transaction est en cours de traitement, les fonctions achetées seront ajoutées à votre système une fois que nous aurons reçu le paiement.
php.LBL_FAILED_TRANSACTION: La transaction a échoué ou a été annulée, veuillez vérifier le paiement sur votre compte PayPal et réessayer.
php.LBL_SIZE_OF_YOUR_COMPANY_HAS_CHANGED: La taille de votre entreprise a changé, le pack acheté est trop petit pour la taille actuelle. Mettez à jour votre abonnement.
php.LBL_SUBSCRIPTION_HAS_EXPIRED: The subscription has expired. Please extend your subscription in order to keep using this functionality.
php.LBL_YETIFORCE_SHOP_PRODUCT_CANCELED: One of the purchased products has expired or requires changing a package. The product has been temporarily canceled.
php.LBL_PAID_FUNCTIONALITY_ACTIVATED: A paid functionality has been activated without purchasing a subscription!!!
php.LBL_SUBSCRIPTION_COMPANY_SIZE_HAS_CHANGE: The company size has changed and it requires a higher tier of the subscription package
php.LBL_SHOP_INVOICE_DETAILS: Données de facturation extraites des données de l'entreprise
php.LBL_SHOP_INVOICE_DETAILS_DESC: La modification des données saisies déclenche la mise à jour des données dans le système
php.LBL_SHOP_PACKAGE_DESC: Dépend de la taille de l'entreprise
php.LBL_SHOP_NO_COMPANIES_ALERT: Il n'y a pas de données de l'utilisateur cible (la société propriétaire du CRM) dans le système. Les données sont nécessaires pour émettre une facture, il n'est pas possible d'effectuer un paiement sans ces données.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDONATIONS_INTRO: Aidez à façonner l'avenir de YetiForce CRM!
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDONATIONS_DESC: Les projets open source qui sont soutenus par la communauté se développent beaucoup plus rapidement que les projets sans aucune contribution, nous vous encourageons donc à nous soutenir avec un don mensuel qui nous permettra de créer un produit encore meilleur pour vous et votre entreprise. Je vous remercie!
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEHELP_INTRO: Support de base pour les administrateurs système [email, vidéo, documentation]
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEHELP_DESC:
YetiForce is a very powerful system, it provides 80+ user modules, 80+ configuration panels, 30+ tools, and understanding them all requires time and extensive experience. By purchasing basic support, you gain access to the knowledge and experience of the YetiForce team that develops the system. Support is provided in English and Polish.
- Email support for users
- Email support for admins

Support via email applies only to basic issues. If your company requires support regarding advanced system capabilities, e.g. creating new modules, process automation - or the system has been modified by a developer, we recommend purchasing the YetiForce Development package.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDISABLEBRANDING_INTRO: Remplacez la marque YetiForce par la vôtre
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDISABLEBRANDING_DESC:
Personalize YetiForce CRM branding by changing the data displayed in the system. Add essential information to the generated documents, enter your company's data in the footer, or set your own links to social media profiles.

Disable YetiForce Branding allows you to remove links of YetiForce social media profiles from the footer of the system and replace them with links to your company's social media profiles. This will allow you to personalize the appearance of the YetiForce system so that application users don’t see redundant information in the footer. In addition, you will also disable the producer's footer in all e-mails sent by the system and PDF printouts generated by the system.

Note: This addon doesn’t disable all YetiForce branding links that are found in the system. Go to Marketplace on our official website to find out more.
php.LBL_SHOP_INTEGRATOR_INTRO: Offrez le système YetiForce à vos clients et bénéficiez d'avantages exclusifs disponibles uniquement pour les partenaires YetiForce Integrator.
php.LBL_SHOP_INTEGRATOR_DESC: EXIGENCES 1. Enregistrement correct de toutes les installations YetiForce utilisées par le partenaire et ses clients. 2. Posséder un compte GitHub et participer activement au référentiel YetiForce. AVANTAGES 1. Support direct (chat, e-mail, GitHub) de l'équipe YetiForce en termes de problèmes avancés liés au fonctionnement du système, à l'API et à la configuration. L'assistance peut être fournie en polonais ou en anglais. Une assistance peut également être fournie aux clients du partenaire dans les cas où le partenaire ne sera pas en mesure d'aider ses clients. 2. La possibilité d'embaucher des employés de YetiForce pour de grandes implémentations (service disponible moyennant un supplément, fourni à distance, communication en polonais et en anglais). 3. La possibilité de coopérer dans les appels d'offres (témoignages clients partagés, liste commune de spécialistes, support dans les devis). 4. Possibilité d'utiliser le logo «YetiForce Integrator» sur Internet. 5. Promotion dans le catalogue de partenariat sur le site officiel et dans le système YetiForce. 6. 10% de réduction sur tous les produits offerts sur le marché par le producteur YetiForce et d'autres partenaires (également pour les propres clients du partenaire). La possibilité de réserver un projet - la remise peut être de 20% mais elle sera accordée à un partenaire qui réserve le projet en premier. 7. L'impact sur l'orientation du développement du système et les nouvelles fonctionnalités. COÛT 1. Les frais de participation mensuels pour le partenariat YetiForce Integrator sont de 250 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDEVELOPMENTSUPPORT_DES:
Advanced system support allows comprehensive support not only for administrators but it also includes customization and adding new functionalities to the system. All work is coordinated by experienced developers who contribute to the system. Support is provided in English and Polish. YetiForce development package includes:
- Email support for users (free)
- Email support for admins (free)
- Solving technical and system errors (subtracted from package hours)
- Adding new functionalities to the system (subtracted from package hours)
- System updates (subtracted from package hours)
- Training (subtracted from package hours)

Each email with description is analyzed and the number of hours is estimated. If the quote is accepted, the task is scheduled.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEINSTALLINCLOUD_DESC: Nous installerons le système sur l'infrastructure la plus efficace répondant aux attentes des clients les plus exigeants. Nous nous occupons de la sécurité, des performances et résolvons tout problème d'infrastructure pour votre commodité. Chaque utilisateur recevra de quelques à plusieurs Go pour les données d'entreprise et la base de données sera placée sur des disques Intel Optane hautes performances. En plus de la version de production, nous configurerons la version de test du système et vous recevrez un accès complet aux sauvegardes d'application. Remarque: Nous travaillons du lundi au vendredi de 8h à 16h (CEST) et avons besoin d'un jour ouvrable pour traiter votre commande.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEINSTALLINHOSTING_DESC: Nous préparerons un hébergement professionnel conforme à l'infrastructure du producteur et répondant parfaitement aux exigences restrictives du système. Nous nous occupons de la sécurité, des performances et résolvons tout problème d'infrastructure pour votre commodité. Chaque utilisateur recevra de quelques à plusieurs Go pour les données d'entreprise et la base de données sera placée sur des SSD hautes performances. En plus de la version de production, nous configurerons la version de test du système et vous recevrez un accès complet aux sauvegardes d'application. Remarque: Nous travaillons du lundi au vendredi de 8h à 16h (CEST) et avons besoin d'un jour ouvrable pour traiter votre commande.
php.LBL_SHOP_INFORMATION: Les prix des produits et services ci-dessous varient en fonction de la taille de l'entreprise. La taille de l'entreprise est déterminée par le nombre d'utilisateurs du système. L'application ajuste automatiquement les prix à la taille de l'entreprise chaque mois, selon les critères suivants: Micro entreprise (jusqu'à 10 utilisateurs), Petite entreprise (jusqu'à 50 utilisateurs), Moyenne entreprise (jusqu'à 250 utilisateurs), Grande (plus de 250 utilisateurs).
php.LBL_SHOP_RESELLER_INTRO: Vendez les produits et services de YetiForce, gagnez de l'argent en faisant la promotion de YetiForce dans votre pays.
php.LBL_SHOP_RESELLER_DESC: EXIGENCES 1. Fournir un support initial aux clients qui se sont vu offrir les produits et services de YetiForce. 2. Posséder un compte GitHub et participer activement au référentiel YetiForce. 3. Enregistrement correct de toutes les installations YetiForce utilisées par le partenaire et ses clients. AVANTAGES 1. Support direct (chat, e-mail, GitHub) de l'équipe YetiForce en termes de résolution de problèmes simples liés au fonctionnement et à la configuration du système. L'assistance peut être fournie en polonais ou en anglais. 2. Possibilité d'utiliser le logo «YetiForce Reseller» sur Internet. 3. Promotion dans le catalogue de partenariat sur le site officiel et dans le système YetiForce. 4. 10% de réduction sur tous les services et produits offerts par YetiForce (également pour les clients des revendeurs). 5. Un impact sur l'orientation du développement du système et de nouvelles fonctionnalités. COÛT 1. Les frais de participation mensuels pour le partenariat YetiForce Reseller sont de 100 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_MODULEPRODUCER_INTRO: Offrez vos modules et fonctionnalités à la communauté YetiForce du monde entier dans la boutique officielle.
php.LBL_SHOP_MODULEPRODUCER_DESC: EXIGENCES 1. Création de modules conformes aux normes technologiques actuelles ainsi qu'à l'architecture du système. 2. Posséder un compte GitHub et participer activement au référentiel YetiForce. 3. Un partenaire doit mettre à jour ses modules et fournir une assistance sur GitHub régulièrement. 4. Enregistrement correct de toutes les installations YetiForce utilisées par le partenaire et ses clients. AVANTAGES 1. Support direct (chat, e-mail, GitHub) de l'équipe YetiForce en termes de résolution de problèmes simples liés au fonctionnement et à la configuration du système. L'assistance peut être fournie en polonais ou en anglais. 2. Possibilité d'utiliser le logo «YetiForce Module Producer» sur Internet. 3. Promotion dans le catalogue de partenariat sur le site officiel et dans le système YetiForce. 4. 10% de réduction sur tous les produits offerts sur le marché par le producteur YetiForce et d'autres partenaires (également pour les propres clients du partenaire). 5. Un impact sur l'orientation du développement du système et de nouvelles fonctionnalités. 6. Audits de qualité et de conformité aux normes des modules Partenaires. 7. Audits de sécurité pour les modules du partenaire. COÛT 1. Les frais de participation mensuels pour le partenariat YetiForce Module Producer sont de 100 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEGEOCODER_INTRO: Recherche rapide et facile de n'importe quelle adresse dans le monde
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEGEOCODER_DESC:
YetiForce Address Search is our proprietary solution that allows you to search for a postal address located anywhere in the world as well as postal addresses for major public administration institutions. This addon is based on the OpenStreetMap (OSM) engine that is run in our hyper-efficient cloud. This integration increases the efficiency of the functionality, significantly improves security in relation to public OSM servers, and provides cost-saving in comparison to using the popular Google Maps service.

The functionality can be used in every module which requires entering address data, e.g. in 'Leads', 'Accounts', 'Contacts', 'Quotes' or 'Sales invoices'.

NOTE! We care about the confidentiality and security of your company's sensitive data. Any data entered by users (employees) into the YetiForce CRM system is not saved or sent to YetiForce S.A., which is a software producer.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEMAP_INTRO: Intégration avec une carte moderne pour la visualisation des données, la cartographie des itinéraires et la recherche d'adresses
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEMAP_DESC:
YetiForce has launched its own, incredibly efficient and secure map servers that are based on the Open Street Maps engine. The add-on enables:

- Direct visualization of Companies and Contacts added to YetiForce CRM.
- Routes calculation between Companies and Contacts existing in the system.
- Searching address data of Companies added to the system.

The main advantages of the YetiForce Map solution are increased security (in comparison to public servers), saving a significant amount of money (in comparison to Google Maps), and high efficiency due to the use of cutting edge server technology.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPASSWORD_INTRO: Vérification en temps réel des mots de passe des utilisateurs contre les violations de données
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPASSWORD_DESC:
YetiForce launched a server with more than 572 million passwords that were leaked as a result of database hacks all over the world. Using this extension will allow you to verify passwords in real time (while creating users, changing passwords, logging into the system) and will warn you if a password that is being currently used has been compromised and should be changed immediately.

Only password hashes (SHA1) are exchanged between your system and our server. We don’t store any information about the system, user, or login; moreover, we don’t record the IP address that sent the request that includes the password hash.

Keep in mind that using Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), as well as allowing access only via trusted IPs or encrypted VPNs will also significantly increase your system security.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEOUTLOOK_INTRO: Intégrez YetiForceCRM à votre client de messagerie Microsoft Outlook
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEOUTLOOK_DESC:
It’s a modern add-on for Microsoft Outlook. It allows you to load the CRM system directly in the Outlook window, where you can download and relate an e-mail to data in the system. In addition, the integration allows you to perform the same operations from the e-mail view as in the standard system, i.e.

- Add companies and contacts (Accounts, Contacts, Leads, Vendors, Partners, Competition)
- Add processes and sub-processes (Opportunities, Agreements, SLA, Campaigns, Quotes, Sales orders, Tickets, etc.)
- Add notes, events, documents
- Work directly from the e-mail client which allows you to optimize the customer service process and makes it easier to perform many activities from one place.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEMAGENTO_INTRO: Integrate the YetiForce CRM system with the Marento e-commerce platform
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEMAGENTO_DESC:
YetiForce integrated with Magento, one of the largest and most popular e-commerce platforms. This solution allows you to conduct centralized activities related to customer service and e-store orders straight from the CRM. It means that you will be able to communicate with clients, create all necessary documents related to orders (eg. invoices, receipts, storage documents) and update stocks - all in one place.

Your employees won’t have to learn how to use the complex Magento platform if you integrate your CRM with this extension, which will result in lower training costs.

Data synchronisation between the two systems takes place using the API (Magento Admin REST endpoints). Flexible design of the solution allows multi store management, i.e integration of YetiForce with multiple stores based on the Magento engine. It also allows one central warehouse or multiple warehouses where each store has its warehouse. Regardless of stores number, YetiForce is always the master system that centralizes data from the Magento platform. The communication is one-way, i.e YetiForce CRM queries the Magento API downloading and updating data in both ways.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPLGUS_INTRO: Get all the company information straight from the polish Central Statistical Office
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPLGUS_DESC:
This module saves time of your employees. Manual search and data verification will be no longer necessary as well as entering the data into the appropriate fields in the record - the system will search for and fill in the appropriate fields. You only need one of the following numbers: VAT ID, NCR, or NOBR numbers to get all the necessary information about a given company and easily save it in the system.

All data is downloaded in real-time directly from the Polish Central Statistical Office using the API (https://api.stat.gov.pl/Home/RegonApi), so it is reliable and up-to-date.

Lists of fields completed automatically in individual modules:

- Accounts: VAT, NCR, TAX number, Account name, Legal form, State, County, Township, City/Village, Post code, Street, Building number, Office number, Country, Primary Phone, Fax, Primary Email, Website
- Leads: VAT, NCR, TAX number, Lead name, Legal form, State, County, Township, City/Village, Post code, Street, Building number, Primary Phone, Fax, Primary Email, Website
- Vendors: Vendor name, NOBR, State, County, Township, City/Village, Post code, Street, Building number, Office number
- Competition: Name, State, County, Township, City/Village, Post code, Street, Building number

Notice: The YetiForce GUS extension can only search for companies registered in Poland.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWIDGETS_INTRO: Il s'agit d'un ensemble de widgets qui permettront d'afficher des informations supplémentaires sur le tableau de bord et dans le récapitulatif de l'enregistrement.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWIDGETS_DESC:
It is a set of widgets that will allow you to display additional information on the dashboard and in the record summary, so that all the necessary details will be available to the user at his fingertips.

1. PDF Preview

It is a widget that allows you to preview a system generated PDF document straight from the record summary view. Thanks to this widget you will be able to preview an invoice or any other PDF document directly from the record, without having to save it on your hard drive. This solution will significantly facilitate the work of users responsible for issuing and sending PDF documents, and the accounting department employees who won’t have to download all invoices in order to view them.

2. Updates

It is a widget that allows you to view the history of user activity. It will let you review all activities that have been performed on records in the system in a given period of time by all users. The widget contains numerous advanced filters that will help you search for individual activities. e.g.
- searching by the user who made the changes
- searching by the owner of the record where the changes were made
- filtering by time interval
- filtering by activity type
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWEBSERVICEPREMIUM_INTR: An extended version of the standard API available in YetiForce CRM for free. The addon was created mainly with the YetiForce Portal platform in mind.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWEBSERVICEPREMIUM_DESC:
YetiForce Webservice Premium is an extended version of the standard API available in YetiForce CRM for free. The addon was created mainly with the YetiForce Portal platform in mind, however, it can be used for various purposes depending on your company's needs.

The Premium Webservice differs from the standard one in the number of supported methods - apart from the basic methods, it also supports the following:

Base module:
- Gets widgets’ data from the dashboard
- Gets records hierarchy
- Generates and downloads a PDF file from a template
- Gets a list of  PDF templates
- Gets the record data from sources
- Gets a list of widgets
- A store functionality - creates a record in an advanced module (orders)

Base action
- Test method for the customer portal
- Gets the menu for the customer portal

Products:
- Gets the details of a product
- A store functionality - gets a list of products for orders

Users:
- Changes user’s preferences

The YetiForce Webservice Premium addon is mandatory for YetiForce Portal to work properly.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEVULNERABILITIES_INTRO: The vulnerability scanner is used to monitor whether the currently used applications on the server and external libraries used in CRM contain publicly known vulnerabilities.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEVULNERABILITIES_DESC:
YetiForce Vulnerabilities is used to monitor whether currently used applications on the server and external libraries used in the CRM contain publicly known vulnerabilities.
The vulnerability scanner detects the versions of used libraries or tools and checks in the global CVE database if there are any known vulnerabilities for the version we have installed.

The scanner checks for:

- external libraries used in CRM (libraries written in PHP)
- vulnerabilities for the used PHP version
- vulnerabilities for the web server (apache, nginx)
- vulnerabilities for libraries on the server: OpenSSL
- vulnerabilities for SQL engine (MySql, MariaDB)
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERBL_INTRO: The YetiForce RBL addon allows you to integrate the internal RBL database with the public RBL database.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERBL_DESC:
YetiForce RBL (Remote Block List) uses a public database (https://soc.yetiforce.com/) of dangerous IP addresses that have been identified as responsible for sending spam.

Thanks to this functionality you will be able to have an up-to-date database of dangerous servers that send out dangerous or unwanted emails.

Using a solution of this type will help to immunize your company's employees against increasingly growing numbers of various hacker attacks, phishing, scams and social engineering attacks.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDAV_INTRO: YetiForce DAV allows for two-way synchronization of contacts, calendar and tasks between different devices by using CardDAV and CalDAV protocols.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEDAV_DESC:
YetiForce DAV consists of two functionalities:
- CalDAV enables two-way synchronization of activities (tasks, calls, meetings) saved in the calendar between YetiForce and any mobile device or other tool supporting the DAV standard.
- CardDAV enables two-way synchronization of contacts between YetiForce and any mobile device or other tool supporting the DAV standard.

Both solutions create a new calendar/address book in the application and after populating them with records, they will be added in the YetiForce system.
Thanks to this, you have access to current activities in the calendar and contacts.
You can find a list of applications that support the DAV standard in the documentation:
https://doc.yetiforce.com/apps/#DAV
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEKANBAN_INTRO: The Kanban board will facilitate your work and speed up the handling of processes
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEKANBAN_DESC:
The Kanban board is a tool used mainly for project management, but in YetiForce CRM this view is available in all user modules where data is stored. Kanban helps to visualize data by grouping them in various ways, effectively define the amount of work in progress and increase efficiency.

Boards in the Kanban view use cards and columns that can be easily configured in the panel according to the needs of your company. Moreover, in the YetiForce CRM system, you can create multiple tables for one module that will present the data grouped in various ways.

Benefits of using the Kanban board:
- The use of this solution will help to improve communication between all team members and departments of the company, which will increase the efficiency and productivity of the team.
- Workflow visualization will influence the optimization of the company's business processes and will help find potentially problematic areas, such as bottlenecks.
- Boards works for any user module that contains data
- Data presentation method can be customized for each board
- Supported field types: Picklists, Assigned to
- Option to display summary of numerical and currency fields
- Supports colors and icons for value fields
- Supports quick edition
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEAUTOASSIGNMENT_INTRO: The mechanism allows you to define the rules for automatically assigning an owner to created records or changing the current owner.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEAUTOASSIGNMENT_DESC:
YetiForce Auto Assignment significantly improves the efficiency of your team's work. The mechanism will automatically assign tasks to a user or a group of users,eg. inquiries sent via a contact form or tickets, on the basis of strictly defined conditions.
The mechanism can estimate the workload of employees in real time and assign new tasks to these employees who are able to take care of them at the moment. All the conditions can be customized using an intuitive panel in the system settings to match the profile of your company.
php.LBL_ACTIVATE_DEACTIVATE_SERVICE_CONFIRM_: Are you sure you want to activate/deactivate service?
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPDFPREMIUM_INTRO: Additional Chromium/Chrome engine to generate PDF files
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEPDFPREMIUM_DESC:
Additional engine to generate PDF Chromium/Chrome files
The Chromium engine used to generate PDFs introduces a method of creating complex PDF files.

Features:
- compatibility with CSS3 and HTML 5
- compatibility with all technologies supported by the browser
- fully supported special characters and fonts
- the only limitation is the browsers capability
- support for OS: Linux, macOS, Windows
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCPLCEIDG_INTRO: Fetch data on Polish companies from the Central Register and Information on Economic Activity in Poland
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCPLCEIDG_DESC:
Fetch data on Polish companies from the Central Register and Information on Economic Activity in Poland (CEIDG)

Country: Poland
Data provider: CEIDG & Biznes.gov.pl https://dane.biznes.gov.pl/ 
Modules: Accounts, Leads, Vendors, Competition
Autocomplete data in the record: Yes
Additional database access fee: No
Account registration: Yes

Data provider: Ministerstwo Sprawiedliwości https://prs.ms.gov.pl/ 
Modules: Accounts, Leads, Vendors
Autocomplete data in the record: Yes

Account registration: No

Modules: Accounts, Leads, Vendors, Competition
Autocomplete data in the record:  No

php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCUKCOMPANIESHOUSE_INT: Fetch data on UK companies from the Comapnies House agency

Fetch data on UK companies from the Comapnies House agency

Modules: Accounts, Leads, Vendors, Competition
Autocomplete data in the record: Yes
Additional database access fee: No
Account registration: Yes
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCUKVATPAYERSTATUS_DES:

Country: United Kingdom
Data provider: HMRC https://www.gov.uk/
Modules: Accounts, Leads, Vendors, Competition, Partners
Autocomplete data in the record: No
Additional database access fee: No

php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCUSAEDGAR_INTRO: Fetch data on US companies from the United States Securities and Exchange Commission

Fetch data on US companies from the United States Securities and Exchange Commission via EDGAR

Country: USA
Data provider:  US SEC  https://www.sec.gov/
Modules: Accounts, Leads, Partners, Vendors, Competition
Autocomplete data in the record: Yes
Additional database access fee: No
Account registration: No
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCFRENTERPRISEGOUV_INT: Fetch data on French companies from the INSEE
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCFRENTERPRISEGOUV_DES:
Fetch data on French companies from the INSEE (Institut National de la Statistique et des Études Économiques)

Country: France
Data provider: INSEE (Institut National de la Statistique et des Études Économiques) 
Modules: Accounts, Leads, Vendors, Partners, Competition
Autocomplete data in the record: Yes
Additional database access fee: No
Account registration: No
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCBRRECEITAWSCNPJ_INTR: Fetch data on Brazilian companies from the database of the Federal Tax Office of Brazil
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCBRRECEITAWSCNPJ_DESC:
Fetch data on Brazilian companies from the database of the Federal Tax Office of Brazil (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas) provided by Receita WS

Country: Brazil
Data provider: Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas (CNPJ)
Modules: Accounts, Leads, Vendors, Partners, Competition
Autocomplete data in the record: Yes
Additional database access fee: No/Yes - limits apply: https://www.receitaws.com.br/#section-plans 
Account registration: Yes

php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEINSTALLPORTALINCLOUD_I: YetiForce Portal in the cloud with a Webservice Premium license
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEINSTALLPORTALINCLOUD_D:
YetiForce Portal in the cloud with a Webservice Premium license is a complex service that provides access to the YetiForce Portal installed on our hyper efficient cloud.
The subscription also includes a YetiForce Webservice Premium license required for the portal to work properly.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWAPROERP_INTRO: YetiForce and Asseco Wapro ERP integration synchronizes customer data between these systems.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEWAPROERP_DESC:
The integration between YetiForce and Asseco Wapro ERP guarantees fast and convenient two-way data synchronization, which allows for even more effective customer management in CRM.

The list of synchronized modules includes:
- Departments/Company (read only)
- Company bank accounts (read only)
- Accounts (read only)
- Contacts (read only)
- Products (read only)
- Invoices (read only)
- Correction invoices (read only)

php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCERCDKCVR_DESC:

Modules: Accounts, Leads, Vendors, Partners, Competition

Account registration: Yes
